main event: An unknown circular object was observed over Ravensont Chester, Ohio at 2210 hours on 4 July 1961, described as white in color and about the size of the full moon, moving upward before vanishing from view.
interesting points: The object was described as circular and white,The sighting occurred on a clear night,The object maneuvered upward before disappearing, The incident involved an official Air Force investigation, The report was filed by Capt. George E. Oetzel.
